parameters.query: INSERT INTO retention_campaigns (customer_id, campaign_type, risk_score, strategy, estimated_cost, expected_roi, priority, created_at, campaign_data) VALUES ({{$json.customer_id}}, '{{$json.campaign_type}}', {{$json.risk_score_final}}, '{{JSON.stringify($json.retention_strategy)}}', {{$json.estimated_cost}}, {{$json.expected_roi}}, '{{$json.priority}}', NOW(), '{{JSON.stringify($json)}}')
